name: LOOPGEON
description:
LOOPGEON

Discover a random generated dungeon that resets every 40 seconds generating a new one with a completly new layout. Could you find the way out before the loop restarts?

What offers the game?
  • Enjoy a fast gameplay with the most simple controls and a smooth movement expeience.
  • Play on 2 different difficulties: 

        Normal - Standar dungeons, perfect for short runs

        Hard - Bigger dungeons (In most cases), a true challenge.

  • Only two keys are needed to play.
Controls
  • X (Key) - Navigate through the menu | Change player direction
  • C (Key) - Accept on menus | Move to the selected direcion.
